keyFacts: The invoice is dated May 23, 2005, and is addressed to Jeffrey E. Epstein.
The total amount due on the invoice is $472.82.
Multiple shipments were processed on May 13, 2005, with various recipients and senders listed.
Discounts totaling $13.19 were applied to the invoice.
Several individuals are mentioned as recipients of shipments, indicating a network of connections.
